entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Baker Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:37 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -36.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baker Lake Airport 8:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -36.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -51
Dewpoint: -40.5°C
Wind: NW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 59 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 39.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 39. Wind chill minus 53 in the morning and minus 59 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
